p: The study revealed that even though access to ART has increased, the quality of HIV services for PLWH is unsatisfactory. This is evident in the poor monitoring of VL rate at 12 months after starting ART, which is at an average of 54% low and viral suppression at 56%, which is far below the target of 90%. This confirms the qualitative results that NIMART nurses are not compliant to guidelines despite training.
